mapper.select: SELECT CATE_CD, CATE_NM, CATE_COMMENT FROM TSMS_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATE_CD
SELECT MAX(CATE_CD) as CATE_CD FROM TSMS_CATEGORY
SELECT CATE_CD, CATE_NM, replace (CATE_COMMENT, '{}', #{customName}) AS CATE_COMMENT FROM TSMS_CATEGORY WHERE CATE_CD = #{cateCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TSMS_CATEGORY(CATE_CD, CATE_NM, CATE_COMMENT) VALUES (#{cateCd}, #{cateNm}, #{cateComment})
mapper.update: UPDATE TSMS_CATEGORY SET CATE_NM = #{cateNm}, CATE_COMMENT = #{cateComment} WHERE CATE_CD = #{cateCd}
